name: btcstampsexplorer
description: This is the API for https://stampchain.io/ and the open source block explorer for Bitcoin Stamps.

scripts.test:api:all: npm run test:api:smoke && npm run test:api:pagination && npm run test:api:comprehensive && npm run test:api:regression
scripts.test:api:summary: echo 'ðŸ“Š Newman Test Collections Summary:' && echo 'âœ… Smoke: 3 endpoints (health checks)' && echo 'âœ… Pagination: 48 requests (boundary testing)' && echo 'âœ… Comprehensive: 18/46 endpoints (39% coverage - needs expansion)' && echo 'âœ… Regression: 6 critical endpoints (dev vs prod + schema detection)'
scripts.test:api:clean: rm -rf reports/newman* && docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman
scripts.test:api:comprehensive:system: NEWMAN_COLLECTION=tests/postman/collections/comprehensive.json NEWMAN_FOLDER='System Health' docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman
scripts.test:api:comprehensive:stamps: NEWMAN_COLLECTION=tests/postman/collections/comprehensive.json NEWMAN_FOLDER='Stamps Endpoints' docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman
scripts.test:api:comprehensive:src20: NEWMAN_COLLECTION=tests/postman/collections/comprehensive.json NEWMAN_FOLDER='SRC-20 Endpoints' docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman
scripts.test:api:comprehensive:regression: npm run test:api:comprehensive && npm run test:api:report:regression
scripts.test:api:daily:regression: NEWMAN_REPORT_PREFIX=daily-regression NEWMAN_ITERATIONS=2 docker-compose -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm newman-comprehensive
scripts.test:api:daily:analyze: npm run test:api:daily:regression && npm run test:api:report:regression && npm run test:api:validate:expected
scripts.test:api:trends:analyze: node -e "console.log('Trends analysis would run here - see daily-regression-tests.yml for implementation')"
